title: Controversial sheriff pardoned by Trump to run for Senate
text:
Controversial sheriff pardoned by Trump to run for Senate 6:12pm GMT - 01:35 
Former Arizona Sheriff Joe Arpaio, a close ally of President Donald Trump, said on Tuesday he was running for the U.S. Senate to replace retiring Republican Senator Jeff Flake.   
Former Arizona Sheriff Joe Arpaio, a close ally of President Donald Trump, said on Tuesday he was running for the U.S. Senate to replace retiring Republican Senator Jeff Flake.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/01/09/controversial-sheriff-pardoned-by-trump?videoId=381440183&videoChannel=13422
